resources.string: The Vision API allows easy integration of vision detection features within developer applications, including image labeling, face and landmark detection, optical character recognition (OCR), and tagging of explicit content.

A LABEL_DETECTION request annotates an image with a label (or "tag") that is selected based on the image content. For example, a picture of a barn may produce a label of "barn", "farm", or some other similar annotation.
Optical Character Recognition (OCR) enables you to detect text within your images, along with automatic language identification. The Vision API supports a broad set of languages.
